sentence.text: The risk of a potential interaction between NovoSeven and coagulation factor concentrates has not been adequately evaluated in preclinical or clinical studies.
sentence.negationtags: The risk of a potential interaction between NovoSeven and coagulation factor concentrates has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been adequately evaluated in preclinical or clinical studies. </scope>

sentence.text: Simultaneous use of activated prothrombin complex concentrates or prothrombin complex concentrates should be avoided.

Although the specific drug interaction was not studied in a clinical trial, there have been more than 50 episodes of concomitant use of antifibrinolytic therapies (i.e., tranexamic acid, aminocaproic acid) and NovoSeven.
sentence.negationtags: Although the specific drug interaction was <scope> <cue> not </cue> studied in a clinical trial, there have been more than 50 episodes of concomitant use of antifibrinolytic therapies (i.e., tranexamic acid, aminocaproic acid) and NovoSeven. </scope>

sentence.text: NovoSeven should not be mixed with infusion solutions until clinical data are available to direct this use.
sentence.negationtags: NovoSeven should <scope> <cue> not </cue> be mixed with infusion solutions until clinical data are available to direct this use. </scope>
